General.Name: Brighton-Best International Taiwan
General.Description: Brighton-Best International (Taiwan) Inc. sells screws and nuts in Taiwan, North America, Oceania, and internationally. It also engages in the import, export, and sale of aluminium products. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 122, Yilin Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 71752
